text: Got older kids? Maybe combine elements of the @Kveller haggadah w/elements of @HIASrefugees modern-refugee-focused haggadah supplement (google it!) &/or Jewish Working Group to End Mass Incarceration's modern-slavery-oriented supplement, via @truahrabbis.

text: Looking for a new family haggadah? @Kveller did a great job with this one! Nice art, nifty sidebars from @TheRaDR @MaNishtana & others. I particularly appreciated @RutiRegan's discussion of Moses as a leader with a disability, fwiw.
